mapper.insert: insert into t_message(content, author, createTime) values (#{content}, #{author}, #{createTime})
mapper.delete: delete from t_message where id = #{id} and author = #{author}
mapper.select: select m.id, m.content, m.author, m.createTime, u.name as authorName from t_message m join t_user u on m.author = u.id where m.id = #{id}
